overview: This is a side of John Farnham that people rarely get to see as he speaks openly about his private life, his dreams, even his love of welding! This is an opportunity to see and hear one of Australia’s living legends up-close and personal.
tagline: This is an opportunity to see and hear one of Australia’s living legends up-close and personal. Includes live performances of seven John Farnham classics plus bonus behind the scenes footage.
title: An Audience with John Farnham
